easy.q: I have a face and two hands but no arms or legs. What am I?

medium.q: If you rearrange letters of 'STOPS' you get a word that means to keep going. Which word is it?
medium.hint: Think of a word from letters STOPS that means to keep moving forward.

hard.q: I am a container of keys but hold no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter but not go outside. What am I?
hard.hint: Think of a device you type on inside a desk or computer.
